professional_summary: Brandon is a dedicated cloud computing professional pursuing his degree at Western Governor's University while working full-time at Wells Fargo. His portfolio demonstrates comprehensive hands-on experience with AWS services, Linux administration, and cybersecurity practices. His projects span from fundamental system administration tasks to advanced cloud architecture implementations, showcasing a well-rounded technical skill set that aligns with his goal of becoming a Solutions Architect. His work emphasizes practical implementation of secure, scalable cloud solutions with a strong focus on both technical excellence and business value.
